avatar.name: Donald Trump
avatar.typeline: A very humble Avatar, perhaps the most humble, ever.
avatar.text:
Tap -> Play or draw a site.
 Tap -> Target a nearby minion, for twice the mana cost take control of this minion this turn.

magic.name: Build The Wall
magic.text: Play a site as well as any number of additional Border Walls from your hand.

magic.name: Prime Real Estate
magic.text: Target a site you own on a prime numbered square, it teleports with all units on it to a target prime numbered void square.

magic.name: Covfefe
magic.text: Choose any card in play, change it's text by a Levenshtein distance of exactly 3.

magic.name: I Demand A Recount
magic.text: Choose a target site with at least as many allies as enemies and at lease 2 allies, take ownership of that site.

magic.name: January 6th
magic.text: Choose a target site, all nearby allied units may move freely to the target to gain +1 power for this turn.

magic.name: September 11th
magic.text: Destroy two targeted sites adjacent to each other.

magic.name: Coronavirus
magic.text:
Must be played as soon as this is drawn.
Deal 3 damage to each unit on each location with 3 or more units.

site.name: Trump Tower
site.text: Genesis -> Adjacent enemy units take 1 damage.

site.name: Border Wall
site.text:
Genesis -> Choose a border of this site to place a Wall.
No unit may traverse the wall.

site.name: Mar-a-Lago
site.text: Enemy unit enters this -> Immediately draw a spell

site.name: Epstein's Island
site.text: Sacrifice Epstein's Island -> Kill a targeted allied minion and heal your avatar by the mana cost of that minion.

site.name: The White House
site.text: Your avatar cannot enter this site. Any allied units on this square have +1 power rating.

site.name: Golf Course
site.text: Damage your avatar by 1 -> Your avatar can tap to teleport this location.

site.name: Four Seasons Total Landscaping
site.text: Genesis -> Each adjacent unit is pulled to this location.

minion.name: White Supremacist
minion.text: Genesis -> If summoned on a square with no enemy units, draw a spell.

minion.name: Patriot
minion.text:
Ranged
 If this shares a square with another Patriot, you may convert both into a single MAGA Rally.

minion.name: MAGA Rally
minion.text: All other allied units on this square have +1 power rating.

minion.name: The Apprentice
minion.text: Spellcaster If spells casted kill a unit, gain 1 mana.

minion.name: Stormy Daniels
minion.text: Genesis -> The enemy may choose to give their site to player and set Stormy Daniel's power to 0.

minion.name: Donald Trump Junior
minion.text: Near allied avatar -> Has doubled power but cannot deal damage.

minion.name: Your uncle.
minion.text: Moving to a new square -> All other occupying units take 2 damage.

minion.name: Hillary Clinton
minion.text: Genesis -> Deal 2 damage to a random unit at a target location no closer than 4 steps away. If Donald Trump is the unit, no damage is dealt.

minion.name: Rudy Giuliani
minion.text: 2 Mana -> Choose an adjacent minion, disable its card text until the start of your next turn.

minion.name: Vince McMahon
minion.text: Genesis -> Random nearby minion changes ownership permanently.

minion.name: Ruth Bader Ginsberg
minion.text:
At the end of each turn, add an age counter.
Deathrite -> Your next spell costs Ruth Bader Ginsberg's age, skip a full turn to avoid this.
